Job Description: Hivetech Vietnam is seeking a skilled and dedicated Business Analyst to join our team. The Business Analyst will be responsible for analyzing business processes, identifying areas for improvement, and developing strategies to enhance efficiency and productivity. The ideal candidate will possess strong analytical skills, excellent communication abilities, and a deep understanding of business operations and IT systems.
Key_Responsibilities:
Collaborate with stakeholders to understand their needs and gather detailed business requirements.
Analyze data to identify trends, patterns, and insights that inform business decisions.
Develop and document business process models to illustrate current and future states.
Propose and design technical and process solutions that meet business needs and objectives.
Work with IT and other departments to implement solutions and ensure they align with business goals.
Communicate findings, recommendations, and project updates to stakeholders and executives.
Create detailed documentation of business requirements, processes, and solutions.
Participate in testing and validating new systems and processes to meet business requirements.
Identify opportunities for process improvements and contribute to ongoing optimization efforts.
Job_Requirements:
Bachelor's degree in Business Administration,  Information Technology or a related field. MBA or relevant certification (e.g., CBAP) is a plus.
Have 4+ years of experience as a Business Analyst or in a related role.
Independently lead requirement gathering discussion and translate requirements to concise and clear visuals e.g. process flows 
Proficient in the use of Atlassian and draw.io tool, etc. 
In general this person should have e-commerce, opstech, data app experience
Solid experience in writing SQL queries 
Good problem-solving skills and attention to detail and teamwork skills
Proficient in Chinese 
Able to communicate and understand EN

Research and provide appropriate technology solutions.
Job_Requirements:
Strong knowledge and at least 8 -10+ year experience in app development using iOS.
Proficiency in Swift and Objective-C programming languages.
Feel at ease with iOS frameworks such as UIKit, Core Data, Core Animation, etc; architecture patterns and best practices.
Expert - level knowledge of modern iOS toolset like Git, Xcode, XCTest, XCUITest and Jenkins
Familiarity with RESTful APIs to connect iOS applications to back-end services.
Solid experience in Agile/Scrum development environments.
Solid understanding of iOS design principles and interface guidelines.
Knowledge of Apple's design principles and application submission process.
Knowledge of Android, AngularJS, Chrome OS, and/or Windows SDK a plus
Understanding and practical experience with Cloud, DevOps, CI/CD, Containers, Docker, k8s is a plus
Excellent problem- solving and debugging skills.
Have an advanced English certificate.
Willing to learn new things, independent working and good team communication.
